aquamapsdata 0.1.6
  • Reference

Reference

General

am_hcaf()

Half degree cell location reference data This table represents an authority file with reference data for half degree cell locations.

am_hspen()

Environmental envelope preference data for suitable habitats for species This table provides data on species environmental parameters / preferences

am_search_exact()

Exact search for taxonomic names

am_search_fuzzy()

Fuzzy search for terms related to taxonomic names

download_db()

Perform downloading of compressed SQLite db, storing it locally

%>%

pipe - convert nested functions into sequential statements

Spatial

am_csc_from_extent()

Cell identifiers for an extent or bounding box

am_map_leaflet()

Map for native habitat

am_raster()

Raster with native habitat map data for one or several species

am_species_in_csc()

Species occuring in set of grid cell

am_species_per_csc()

Total count for number of distinct species across cells, ie "richness"

csquare_from_dd()

csquare code conversion from decimal degrees

csquare_to_dd()

csquare code conversion to decimal degrees

rasterize_coords()

Converts location coordinate data into raster data

which_cells_in_raster()

Raster grid cell identifiers (LOICZID) with presence

About

am_citation()

Citation to use when publishing data from this source

am_meta

Metadata describing field names available

aquamapsdata-package

aquamapsdata

Data Management

am_custom_query()

Run a custom SQL query

am_db_duckdb()

Location of duck db file

am_db_sqlite()

Location of sqlite3 db file

am_use_offline_db()

Staged install workaround to install temporary extdata

con_am()

Connection to aquamapsdata

db_disco()

Disconnect the default database connection

db_minify()

Minify a larger aquamaps dataset by slicing

db_minify_path()

Location of minified bundled sqlite db

db_sync()

Sync a MariaDB/MySQL database to a local SQLite3 db

default_db()

Set or switch the default database used

http_ping()

Ping a web site

Contents
